SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Revisit Rate ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Revisit Rate  is Attraction Capacity Utilization Rate

SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Revisit Rate  is Tourist Satisfaction Rate .

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Wuside?
